item.title: Open Source Foundries at ELC IoT Summit 2018
item.description:
Open Source Foundries is excited to have an opportunity to demonstrate our end to end IoT microPlatforms at this years Embedded Linux conference and the IoT Summit alongside the Zephry project.

This year, the conference will take place in Portland Oregon, at the downtown Portland Hilton, March 12-15.

Open Source Foundries will be presenting on 4 topics at this year’s IoT Summit.
